resources.string:
Very Addictive Gameplay.Delete all the numbers from the grid in minimum number of moves.
 One move is defined as follows:
 -Choose any 2 numbers, say X and Y, from the given grid such that X != Y (X not equal to Y), and remove them,or
 -Choose any 1 number, say X, from the grid, and remove it. Do it as fast as you can.Is it easy? Lets see!
There are two modes in the game:
Offline mode:Here you will be facing yourself, Find the minimum number of tasks as fast as you can and make your highscore to reach into the next high level.

Online mode:Here you will play this game facing your facebook\n friends as the competitors.Prove yourself best among them.the result will be broadcasted to all the friends who are playing, Sounds interesting is not t it? Yeah it is.
